NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Repair, maintenance and associated services related to roads and other equipment

CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03C02

TITLE.P: E1153 South Rogaland 2018-2019 Operational contract electro

SHORT_DESCR.P: The assignment includes operation and maintenance assignments related to electrical installations, with functional responsibility for some of the assignments on national roads, national foot/bicycle paths, county roads, and county foot/bicycle paths with accompanying side installations. Side areas, equipment and installations, in accordance with the object lists in chapter D2-V. The geographical area covered by the contract is indicated in chapter D2-S01. The assignment includes i.a a. inspection, function testing and internal control as well as periodical works, repair of damage and replacement/installation of objects. The assignment also includes registration, planning of the work, contingency, documentation, reporting to the builder and handling of other assignments that are necessary for the operation and maintenance of electrical installations on the road network.

The assignment includes operation and maintenance assignments related to electrical installations, with functional responsibility for some of the assignments on national roads, national foot/bicycle paths, county roads, and county foot/bicycle paths with accompanying side installations, side areas, equipment and installations in Lund, Sokndal, Eigersund, Bjerkreim, Hå, Time, Klepp, Gjesdal, Sandnes, Sola, Stavanger, Randaberg, Forsand, Strand, Rennesøy, Kvitsøy, Finnøy and parts of Hjelmeland municipalities in accordance with the object lists in chapter D2-V. The geographical area covered by the contract is indicated in chapter D2-S01. The work will be settled by round sum for round sum processes, in accordance with amounts and unit prices for other processes such as daywork in accordance with the hourly rates for crew and machines. The contract will be valid in the period 2018.5.1 to 2019.12.31 for all the tasks that have been described. The Builder has an option to extend the contract for 12 months, from 2020.1.1 until 2020.12.31. The assignment includes i.a a. inspection, function testing and internal control as well as periodical works, repair of damage and replacement/installation of objects. The assignment also includes registration, planning of the work, contingency, documentation, reporting to the builder and handling of other assignments that are necessary for the operation and maintenance of electrical installations on the road network.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The Builder has an option to extend the contract for 12 months, from 2020.1.1 until 2020.12.31.

INFO_ADD.P: A tender conference will be held on 2018.3.8, meet at Bergelandsgata 30, Stavanger at 12:00.

SUITABILITY.P: Tenderers shall be a legally established company.
Company Registration Certificate Foreign tenderers shall instead submit equivalent.
Certificates as prescribed in the legislation of the country where the tenderer is established.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: The tenderer must have good economic and financial capacity to complete the contract.
There are requirements for tenderers´ equity [annual turnover, equity ratio] See the tender documentation for detailed information.
Documentation requirement: Annual accounts etc. See the tender documentation for detailed information.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: The tenderer must have positive equity.
An average annual turnover of minimum NOK 20 000 000 for the three previous financial years.
Tenderers shall have an equity ratio of at least 10 %.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Tenderers must have sufficient experience of a relevant nature and degree of difficulty from the following works:
Main disciplines included in the assignment: Operation and maintenance tasks related to electrical installations on roads.
Sub-assignments of significant importance for the contract work: Street lights, automation, machine, traffic management installations.
See the tender documentation for further information.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: C2: Special contractual regulations for construction works, the Norwegian National Roads Administration.

PLACE.P: The opening of the tenders is not open to the public.
